meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being strange.
meanings.sent1: The strangenesses of the old house intrigued the children.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but notice the strangenesses in his behavior.
meanings.sent3: The party had a touch of strangenesses when the clown arrived.
meanings.sent4: The fog added an eerie strangenesses to the forest at night.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the strangenesses of the abandoned town in his painting.

meanings.definition: Strange or unusual occurrences or events.
meanings.sent1: The town's residents were puzzled by the strangenesses happening lately.
meanings.sent2: The book was filled with thrilling strangenesses that kept the reader hooked.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show had unexpected strangenesses that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sudden silence in the room created a moment of strangenesses.
meanings.sent5: The scientist was fascinated by the strangenesses of the unexplained phenomenon.
